titles.title: To preserve the name of the Squaw Creek National Wildlife Refuge, and for other purposes.
To preserve the name of the Squaw Creek National Wildlife Refuge, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: This bill declares that the wildlife refuge in Missouri that is the subject of the Squaw Creek National Wildlife Refuge Comprehensive Conservation Plan, as approved on July 19, 2005, shall be known as the Squaw Creek National Wildlife Refuge.
